name: SkywatchSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn off the office lamp.”
”Alexa, lock the front door.”
”Alexa, what is the temperature of kitchen?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill enables your Echo to control devices, or retrieve sensor information, in your Skywatch account. The devices include
- switches and dimmers,
- PIR, temperature, humidity sensors,
- and network cameras.

For a full list of devices supported by Skywatch, please visit https://www.skywatch24.com/hardware-en.
